cv.intro: Computer Engineer with over 5 years of experience in software development. Proficient in various programming languages and frameworks. Extensive experience in web development, machine learning, image processing, and artificial intelligence. Skilled in database management systems, including design, normalization, migration, and optimization. Completed a Master's in Artificial Intelligence at Universidad Internacional de La Rioja (UNIR), with a focus on advanced AI techniques, machine learning, and data-driven solutions. Experienced in project management, teamwork, and the use of modern technologies such as Python, React, Django, TensorFlow, and Docker.

home.presentation: I am from Guayaquil, Ecuador. I studied computer engineering at ESPOL University (Escuela Superior Polit√©cnica del Litoral). I like playing guitar, soccer, watching movies, taking photos and traveling to new places. I really enjoy working in a team since I can learn new things from my coworkers. I'm a coder who loves to create cool stuff that represents different challenges and learn from them to improve my experience!
